p.codeblock: public class VideoCanvas { public static final int RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN = 1; public static final int RENDER_MODE_FIT = 2; public static final int RENDER_MODE_ADAPTIVE = 3; public View view; public int renderMode; public int mirrorMode; public int sourceType; public int sourceId; public int uid; }

__attribute__((visibility("default"))) @interface AgoraRtcVideoCanvas : NSObject @property(strong, nonatomic) VIEW_CLASS *_Nullable view; @property(assign, nonatomic) AgoraVideoRenderMode renderMode; @property(assign, nonatomic) AgoraVideoMirrorMode mirrorMode; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSUInteger uid; @property(copy, nonatomic) NSString *_Nullable userId; @property(nonatomic, assign) AgoraVideoSourceType sourceType; @property(nonatomic, assign) int sourceId; @end

struct VideoCanvas { view_t view; media::base::RENDER_MODE_TYPE renderMode; VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_TYPE mirrorMode; uid_t uid; VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType; VideoCanvas(view_t v, media::base::RENDER_MODE_TYPE m, VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_TYPE mt, uid_t u) : view(v), renderMode(m), mirrorMode(mt), uid(u), sourceType(VIDEO_SOURCE_CAMERA_PRIMARY) {} };

pd.p: The rendering mode of the video. See .
The mirror mode of the view. See .

ul.li: For the mirror mode of the local video view: If you use a front camera, the SDK enables the mirror mode by default; if you use a rear camera, the SDK disables the mirror mode by default.
For the remote user: The mirror mode is disabled by default.

plentry.pd: The type of the video frame, see .
The ID of the video source.
